Quiz

On the following pages you will be asked 10 questions about health and safety representatives (HSRs) and the duties that a PCBU owes to the representative. We will also ask questions about health and safety committees and the role of WHS entry permit holders.

 

You will be asked multiple choice questions. Answer each question by clicking the button to the left of the most appropriate response.

 

After you answered each question, you will not be able to amend your answer for that session.

 

Please note that if you exit the quiz before completing the quiz, then your answers will not be saved.

 

To move between questions, use the ► navigation button on the bottom right of the page.
